permissions.name: Browse
permissions.description: Ability to access a project, browse its measures, and create/edit issues for it.

permissions.name: Administer
permissions.description: Ability to access project settings and perform administration tasks. (Users will also need "Browse" permission)

permissions.name: Administer Issues
permissions.description: Grants the permission to perform advanced editing on issues: marking an issue False Positive / Won't Fix or changing an Issue's severity. (Users will also need "Browse" permission)

permissions.name: See Source Code
permissions.description: Ability to view the project's source code. (Users will also need "Browse" permission)

permissions.name: Execute Analysis
permissions.description: Ability to execute analyses, and to get all settings required to perform the analysis, even the secured ones like the scm account password, the jira account password, and so on.
